# name

**Instance Property**

The accessory name to display in the picker.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Customizing display properties

- **productImage**: An image of the accessory to display in the picker.

items.description: An image of the accessory to display in the picker.
items.name: productImage

title: name
